content: {{knowledge objective |Identifiant=OIC-049-11-A |Item_parent=Normal and pathological puberty |Item_parent_short=Normal and pathological puberty |Rank=A |Title=Knowing how to interpret a growth curve |Description=None |Rubric=Positive diagnosis |Contributors= |Order=11}} Calculate annual growth rate, measure BMI

question.question: Calculate annual growth rate, measure BMI
question.option_a: Calculate the sum of the growth rate and the rate of change in BMI over time.
question.option_b: The rate of change in BMI is directly proportional to the growth rate.
question.option_c: The growth rate is the rate of change in BMI over time, while the rate of change is the rate of change in height.
question.option_d: BMI is directly proportional to the growth rate.
